member.summary: Do not display the element, and do not reserve space for it in layout.

member.name: T:StatNeth.Blaise.API.DataEntry.DataEntryController
member.summary: A DataEntryController communicates with the servers of the serverpark to host an interview session for a data entry client

member.name: M:StatNeth.Blaise.API.DataEntry.DataEntryController.StartInterview(System.Guid,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Start an Interview session (to obtain the first page of the interview).
member.param: The instrumentId is a globally unique identifier (GUID) to identify the project (questionnaire).
The InstrumentName is the name of the project (questionnaire).
Blaise instruments can run in different languages, different modes of behavior, and use different layout. These settings can be passed on as runtime arguments to the data entry session.
A cultureId identifies a group of settings that define unique ways of representing numbers, currency, dates and times and the direction in which texts are written right-to-left or left-to-right.
The width of the user's screen, in pixels.
The height of the user's screen, in pixels.

member.name: E:StatNeth.Blaise.API.DataEntry.DataEntryController.OnQuestionnaireCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when the interview session is successfully completed.

member.summary: Occurs when the Intreview session is aborted.

member.name: E:StatNeth.Blaise.API.DataEntry.DataEntryController.OnQuestionnaireError
member.summary: Occurs when there is an error in the Intereview session.

member.summary: Occurs when the new page definition has been processed (and new UI-controls are created).
